title: Add a financial product
content_markdown:
Version: 8.3Creatio Financial Services CRM
On this page
Build a structured product catalog, maintain pricing and availability and manage key product details. This ensures consistent and reliable product data across product selection, onboarding, and servicing. Manage products in the **Products** section that stores information about the financial products and services offered by your organization, such as cards, bank accounts, loans, or investment services.
To add a new financial product:
1. **Open the Products** section.
2. **Click New**. This opens a mini page.
3. **Fill out the main product characteristics**.
Field name| Field value  
---|---  
Photo| Logo of the product shown in selection and product pages. Click ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/btn_upload_image.png) to add an image. Recommended aspect ratio 1 : 1.Click ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/btn_update_image.png) to update the image.Click ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/btn_delete_image.png) to delete the image.  
Name| Name of the product or service. Required.  
Category| High-level product category. Used to filter the **Type** field. Required.  
Type| Specific product type filtered by the selected category. Required.  
4. Click ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/btn_open_other_page.png) to **continue filling out** its characteristics.
5. **Fill out the product profile**.
Product profile
![Product profile](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/scr_fin_product_profile.png)
Field name| Field value  
---|---  
Status| Current lifecycle status of the product. On the product page, the status is displayed as a progress bar. Only products in "Current" status are available for selection.  
Available for| Target customer segment. For example, "Contact" (retail), "Legal entity" (B2B).  
Subtype| Subtype filtered by the selected type. Optional. For example, "Personal CDs", "Business CDs".  
Owner| Employee responsible for the product. Populated automatically using the record creator, but can be changed.  
Start date| Date when the product becomes active. Required when status is "Current" or "Outdated".  
End date| Date of product deactivation. Required when status is "Outdated".  
Inactive| Hides the product from offers and selection flows. Use when the product is withdrawn from sale or shipment.  
6. **Add general product information** on the **Product information** tab:
Field name| Field value  
---|---  
Link| URL to a related public web page.  
Short description| Brief features that distinguish the product within its category and type. Displayed on the product selection page.  
General conditions| Summary of key product features.  
Benefits| Advantages displayed in the additional information window during product selection.  
Notes| Additional internal information about the product.  
7. **Save the product**.
**As a result,** the product record will contain all required information and will be ready for further use.
Fig. 2 Financial product
![Fig. 2 Financial product](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/scr_bank_product_example.png)
* * *
## See also​
[Form funancial product categories and types](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=1921)
[Form financial product conditions](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2156)
